We can no longer tolerate private equity groups taking over chain stores,stripping them for parts to close them.

These Wall St firms fire thousands of workers en masse, w/o severance, for a profit.

It’s wrong & it undermines basic dignity AND our economy.

People are supposed to be able to rely on public transit - esp during a heat wave.
